short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refresh tabs based on custom intervals. Works independently of tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AUTO Reload Tabs comes in handy to any user who needs to perform automatic web page refresh at certain times efficiently. Which is useful when monitoring content included in a dynamic web page.
Features:
* Refresh pages after a set number of seconds.
* Set different delays per page or tab.
* Remembers your settings per page.
Queue and rate us to launch more new features in the near future.
